mdRecord.dcterms:creator: La RouÃ«rie, Charles Armand Tuffin, marquis de, 1751-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His response to Jefferson's letter was delayed by his wife's death; remarks that the reputation of the U.S. government has "fal[le]n in discredit" for its failure to pay the money owed to several French veterans of the Revolutionary War; this will be the last time he writes to Jefferson on this topic.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1786 September 25, "la Rouerie," [Brittany, France], to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
